product.description: Jett provides the smooth ride and improved handling of 29" wheels in an M4 aluminium XC trail bike designed just for women. The all-new Jett 29 Expert hardtail features Women's XC 29er Geometry, RockShox Reba RL 29 fork, and Shimano BR-M505 hydraulic disc brakes.

bullets.bullet: Fully butted, smooth-welded M4 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's XC 29er Geometry delivers a confident and lightweight ride, with integrated headset for precision handling

RockShox Reba RL 29 80mm-travel fork with rebound/preload adjustment, lockout, and custom tunability delivers versatility over varying terrain; size 15" has 51mm offset fork, sizes 17" and 19" have standard 46mm offset
Custom SRAM S-1250 XC double crankset with GXP spindle for smooth pedalling performance; Shimano XT Shadow rear derailleur means crisp shifting
Shimano Deore hydraulic disc brakes for superb control and modulation
Women's Body Geometry Riva Comp saddle features a women's cutout and plush seating area for all-day riding comfort

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized Jett M4 Premium Aluminium, Women's XC 29er Geometry and tubesets, fully butted w/ smooth welds, integrated headset, forged post-mount 160mm dropouts w/ replaceable hanger, disc only
specs.fork: FORK RockShox Reba RL 29, TurnKey damping w/ Push-Loc remote lockout, Solo Air spring, 1-1/8" alloy steerer, 32mm alloy stanchions, 80mm travel, SM/15: 51mm offset, MD/17 and LG/19: 46mm offset
specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" threadless, Campy style, integrated full cartridge bearings
specs.stem: STEM Specialized 3D forged 6061 alloy, 4-bolt clamp, 7-degree rise, 31.8mm
specs.handlebars: HANDLEBARS Specialized flat bar, double-butted 6061 alloy, 660mm wide, 10-degree backsweep, 4-degree upsweep, 31.8mm
specs.grips: GRIPS Specialized Women's Body Geometry XCT, Kraton w/ gel, closed end, lock-on
specs.front_brake: FRONT BRAKE Shimano Deore, hydraulic disc, 160mm rotor
specs.rear_brake: REAR BRAKE Shimano Deore, hydraulic disc, 160mm rotor
specs.brake_levers: BRAKE LEVERS Avid Elixir 3R, hydraulic lever, tool-less reach adj.
specs.rear_derailleur: REAR DERAILLEUR Shimano Deore XT Shadow, 10-speed, GS cage
specs.shift_levers: SHIFT LEVERS Shimano Deore, 10-speed Rapidfire Plus, w/ optical display
specs.crankset: CRANKSET Custom SRAM S-1250, 10-speed XC double, GXP
specs.bottom_bracket: BOTTOM BRACKET SRAM GXP BB for 2pc., 73mm shell
specs.pedals: PEDALS Alloy, 1pc. body and cage, w/ reflectors, 9/16"
specs.rims: RIMS Stout SL Disc 29", alloy double-wall, 26mm, sleeve joint, 36h
specs.front_hub: FRONT HUB Specialized disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, cartridge bearings, steel axle, QR, 36h
specs.rear_hub: REAR HUB Specialized disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, cartridge bearings, steel axle, steel cassette body, QR, 36h
specs.front_tire: FRONT TYRE Specialized Ground Control, 29x2.1", Kevlar bead, 60TPI
specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Ground Control, 29x2.1", Kevlar bead, 60TPI
specs.saddle: SADDLE Specialized Body Geometry Riva Comp Women's, hollow Cr-Mo rails, 155mm
specs.seat_binder: SEAT BINDER Alloy, 31.8mm, QR, brass washer

geo.seat_tube_length_center_to_top: Seat Tube Length, Center to Top (mm) 381 431.8 482.6

product.description: Jett provides the smooth ride and improved handling of 29" wheels in an M4 aluminium XC trail bike designed just for women. The all-new Jett 29 Comp hardtail features Women's XC 29er Geometry, RockShox XC32 TK SL 29 fork, and Shimano Deore drivetrain.

bullets.bullet: Fully butted, smooth-welded M4 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's XC 29er Geometry delivers a confident and lightweight ride, with integrated headset for precision handling

RockShox XC32 80mm-travel 29" fork with rebound/preload adjustment, lockout, and custom tunability delivers versatility over varying terrain; size 15" has 51mm offset fork, sizes 17" and 19" have standard 46mm offset
Custom SRAM S-1250 XC double crankset with GXP spindle for smooth pedalling performance; Shimano Deore rear derailleur for precise shifts
Tektro Gemini hydraulic disc brakes with 160mm rotors provide simple, powerful, and dependable stopping power
Women's Body Geometry Riva Comp saddle features a women's cutout and plush seating area for all-day riding comfort

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized Jett M4 Premium Aluminium, Women's XC 29er Geometry and tubesets, fully butted w/ smooth welds, integrated headset, forged post-mount 160mm dropouts w/ replaceable hanger, disc only
specs.fork: FORK RockShox XC32 TK 29, TurnKey hydraulic damping w/ lockout, coil spring w/ custom women's spring weights, 1-1/8" alloy steerer, mag disc only post-mount lower, 30mm steel stanchions, preload and rebound adj., 80mm travel, SM/15: 51mm offset, MD/17 and LG/19: 46mm offset

specs.bottom_bracket: BOTTOM BRACKET SRAM GXP BB for 2pc., 73mm shell
specs.pedals: PEDALS Alloy, 1pc. body and cage, w/ reflectors, 9/16"

specs.front_hub: FRONT HUB Specialized disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, cartridge bearings, steel axle, QR, 36h
specs.rear_hub: REAR HUB Specialized disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, cartridge bearings, steel axle, steel cassette body, QR, 36h

product.description: Jett provides the smooth ride and improved handling of 29" wheels in an M4 aluminium XC trail bike designed just for women. The all-new Jett 29 Comp hardtail features Women's XC 29er Geometry, custom-tuned 80mm-travel RockShox 29 fork, and Tektro Draco hydraulic disc brakes with women's shorter reach levers for precise braking and durability.

bullets.bullet: Fully butted, smooth-welded M4 Premium Aluminium frame with Women's XC 29er Geometry delivers a confident and lightweight ride, with integrated headset for precision handling
Custom-tuned 80mm-travel RockShox 29" fork with hydraulic damping, lockout, and women's spring weights delivers the supple ride qualities of a premium suspension fork
Lightweight and durable double-wall alloy rims are tough enough to handle the rough stuff
Custom Samox crankset with forged alloy arms and Octalink-splined BB interface means greater durability and better shifting performance
Tektro Draco dual-piston hydraulic disc brakes and women's shorter reach levers assure precise braking and durability
Women's Body Geometry Riva Comp saddle features a women's cutout and plush seating area for all-day riding comfort

specs.frame: FRAME Specialized Jett M4 Premium Aluminium, Women's XC 29er Geometry and tubesets, fully butted w/ smooth welds, integrated headset, forged post-mount 160mm dropouts w/ replaceable hanger, disc only
specs.fork: FORK RockShox XC28 29, TurnKey hydraulic damping w/ lockout, coil spring w/ custom women's spring weights, 1-1/8" alloy steerer, mag disc only post-mount lower, 28mm steel stanchions, preload and rebound adj., 80mm travel, SM/15: 51mm offset, MD/17 and LG/19: 46mm offset
specs.headset: HEADSET 1-1/8" threadless, Campy style, integrated full cartridge bearings
specs.stem: STEM Specialized 3D forged alloy, 4-bolt clamp, 6-degree rise, 31.8mm
specs.handlebars: HANDLEBARS Specialized flat bar, double-butted 6061 alloy, 660mm wide, 10-degree backsweep, 4-degree upsweep, 31.8mm
specs.grips: GRIPS Specialized Women's Body Geometry XCT, Kraton w/ gel, closed end, lock-on
specs.front_brake: FRONT BRAKE Tektro Draco 2, hydraulic disc, dual piston, Light Wave style rotor, 160mm rotor
specs.rear_brake: REAR BRAKE Tektro Draco 2, hydraulic disc, dual piston, Light Wave style rotor, 160mm rotor
specs.brake_levers: BRAKE LEVERS Tektro Draco 2, hydraulic lever, women's shorter reach
specs.shift_levers: SHIFT LEVERS Shimano Alivio, 9-speed Rapidfire Plus, w/ optical display
specs.bottom_bracket: BOTTOM BRACKET Shimano, Octalink spline, cartridge bearings, 73mm shell
specs.rims: RIMS Stout Disc 29", alloy double-wall, 26mm, pin joint, 36h
specs.front_hub: FRONT HUB Specialized disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, cartridge bearings, steel axle, QR, 36h
specs.rear_hub: REAR HUB Specialized disc, alloy, Hi Lo flange, cartridge bearings, steel axle, steel cassette body, QR, 36h

specs.rear_tire: REAR TYRE Specialized Ground Control Sport, 29x2.1", wire bead, 60TPI
specs.saddle: SADDLE Specialized Body Geometry Riva Comp Women's, hollow Cr-Mo rails, 155mm
